TITLE: Episode 34 - Behold a Pale Vixen
DESCRIPTION: Maddie and Jessie discuss the book “Behold a Pale Horse” by William Cooper. They discuss many of the topics brought up in the book and see he was correctly forecasting our present political and social climate.  We also cover William Cooper’s ultimate demise and see why he was a very paranoid man.
